title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6029.2 - Certification of security guard instructor, special security guard instructor and armed security guard instructor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6029.2 - Certification of security guard instructor, special security guard instructor and armed security guard instructor

State Regulations

Instructor certification for security guard instructor, special security guard instructor and armed security guard instructor may be
granted by the commissioner upon demonstration of instructor competency and
subject matter expertise and payment of an application fee, in accordance with
the minimum requirements established by this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6029.2

Adopted, New

York State Register February 5, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 5, eff. 2/5/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
